channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M3
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M3

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M3 eastbound between J3 and J2 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M3 eastbound between junctions J3 and J2, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M3 eastbound within J6 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M3 eastbound at junction J6, expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to roadworks closing three lanes, from 10 pm on 7 October 2011 to 6 am on 10 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M3 westbound within J6 | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M3 westbound at junction J6, expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to roadworks closing three lanes, from 10 pm on 7 October 2011 to 6 am on 10 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M3 J3 eastbound access | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M3 eastbound entry slip at junction J3 will be closed due to roadworks, between 10 pm and 6 am, from 6 October 2011 to 8 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M3 J4A westbound access | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M3 westbound entry slip at junction J4A will be closed due to roadworks, between 10 pm and 6 am, from 5 October 2011 to 7 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M3 J4A eastbound exit | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M3 eastbound exit slip at junction J4A will be closed due to roadworks, between 10 pm and 6 am, from 3 October 2011 to 5 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M3 J4A eastbound access | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M3 eastbound entry slip at junction J4A will be closed due to roadworks, between 10 pm and 6 am, from 3 October 2011 to 5 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M3 J3 westbound exit | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M3 westbound exit slip at junction J3 will be closed due to roadworks, from 9:40 pm on 4 October 2011 to 6 am on 5 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M3 westbound between J8 and J9 | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M3 westbound will be closed between junctions J8 and J9 due to roadworks, between 10 pm and 6 am, from 3 October 2011 to 5 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M3 eastbound between J4A and J4 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M3 eastbound between junctions J4A and J4, expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to roadworks , between 10 pm and 6 am, from 3 October 2011 to 7 October 2011.
